thread.section_title: Salden Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Salden | www.salden.nl | 4 van 103
thread.title: Tomas Parizek

author: Tomas Parizek
title: Tomas Parizek
text:
Shop offers excellent customer service, easy to communicate with, fast response, specification as requested, shipment as announced.
Parcel with bike was very well packed to avoid any harm.
Only the delivery service (post.nl) did not provide tracing information at all. Not e-shops fault, but may give feedback to post service.
I'm happy about delivered bike and I can only recommend this e-shop to others.
Thank you.
